meanings.sent1: The oarfish swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw an oarfish at the aquarium last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The oarfish decided to wear a tiny top hat for a day out.
meanings.sent4: Her flowing hair resembled the movements of an oarfish in the water.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the oarfish caught the sunlight beautifully.

meanings.sent1: We had to oarfish our way back to shore after the motor broke.
meanings.sent2: He likes to oarfish early in the morning on the calm lake.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to oarfish backwards just for fun.
